comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: In 1918 he became Tsar Boris III of Bulgaria (30 January [O.S. 18 January] 1894 – 28 August 1943). Some other Bain photos that include him: www.flickr.com/search/?w=8623220@N02&q=prince%20boris%20 Wikimedia Commons has what appears to be an uncropped version of this photo, which it credits to Rudolf Mosse, "Album de la Grande Guerre" №10, 1915. commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:BASA-237K-1-361-1a-Boris_... The LOC has this publication, but it is not online: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/2005692367/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A 1922 photo (when he was Tsar) in similar uniform is in The Washington times. (Washington [D.C.]), 27 April 1922. HOME FINAL EDITION, Image 15, bottom center chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84026749/1922-04-27/ed-...
